text: Un Certain Matin is a 1991 Burkinese award-winning movie made by . In 2011, academic Yifen Beus argued that the film reflects the filmmaker’s experience in filmmaking as a female director, While feminists also argued similarly that the film was meant to demystify it. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1991 movies Category:French-language movies Category:Burkinabé movies Category:Movies set in Africa
title: Un Certain Matin
